official_title: Testing Methods to Increase Lung Cancer Screening Among Quitline Callers
inclusion_criteria:
* enrolled in the quitline
* 50-80 years old
* >20-pack year smoking history
* never screened or >12 months since prior screen
* English speaking
* able to provide meaningful consent
* no family members in the same household enrolled in the trial

Exclusion Criterion:

* prior lung cancer
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 50 Years
Must have maximum age of 80 Years
